title: Drawing, "Man and two girls practising Ballet Steps", ca. 1940
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper
description: Man and two girls in white practising ballet steps. Upper half, two exhausted pupils sitting on floor.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Man and two girls practising Ballet Steps", ca. 1940.
ca. 1940. Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-14.
